metadata.title: CVE-2023-52525 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:mwifiex: Fix oob check condition in mwifiex_process_rx_packet Only skip thecode path trying to access the rfc1042 headers when the buffer is toosmall, so the driver can still process packets without rfc1042 headers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-52525` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-171-generic - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-5.4.0-171-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-171-generic - 5.4.0-171.189
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-171-lowlatency - 5.4.0-171.189
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
